Class Passive

  • java.lang.Object
    • Unit
      • Monster
        • Passive
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bat

    public class Passive
extends Monster
    Represents the base class for all Passive monster sub-types in the game world.

        Handles player attacks
        Parameters:
        delta - time passed since last frame (milliseconds)
        Returns:
